Package rs.raf.exception

package rs.raf.exception
  • Class
    Description
    DirectoryHandlerExceptions
    Directory Handler exceptions.
    DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadFiltersException
    Occurs if value specified in config is less than one.
    DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException
    Occurs if path is in bad format.
    DirectoryHandlerExceptions.FileExtensionException
    Occurs if a file is attempted to be created with an excluded extension specified in the config.
    DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException
    Occurs if parameter is in bad format.
    DirectoryHandlerExceptions.MaxFileCountExceededException
    Occurs if max file count for directory is exceeded.
    DirectoryHandlerExceptions.MaxRepositorySizeExceededException
    Occurs if max repository size is exceeded.
    DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException
    Occurs if no file exists at path.
    DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NonExistentRepositoryException
    Occurs if path starts with a non-existent repository name.
    DirectoryHandlerExceptions.ValueInConfigCannotBeLessThanOneException
    Occurs if value specified in config is less than one.
